channel.title: Dark Streets & Darker Secrets: Beneath the Canals
channel.description:
![cover|396x481](upload://jmcrQJDyOm6j8cvkjdn1JHJ2OaQ.png)
Everyone knows Pentola, with its catacombs and canals, is built on top of something even older. But few have gone as deeply into the worlds of "Those Who Came Before" as you will be: The Suzerain of Zehir is a mystic, spiritual advisor, and wealthy patron, but also famously vindictive and impatient. For the money they have put on the table, you can get yourself out of your debts if you can find what they and their cult want.
This will be a "fantasy du siecle" take on Zine Quest setting of Pentola detailed in "Beath the Canals," but with aesthetics and technologies reminiscent of our world in the late 19th and early 20th centuries. We'll be using Diogo Nogueira's recently Kickstarted game of occult mysteries and monsters: "Dark Streets & Darker Secrets."
Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. The session will be recorded.
We will be operating under The Gauntlet's Inclusivity Policy (http://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html), and we will be using the X-Card and Lines & Veils as safety tools.
* [date=2019-05-07 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-05-07 time=23:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_n-ROHwf54T4M3adDp) * [date=2019-05-14 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-05-14 time=23:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_n-_Nw1w2Dj8J3wxc8) * [date=2019-05-21 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-05-21 time=23:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_n-xTu4q78PQHE6ame) * [date=2019-05-28 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-05-28 time=23:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_n08WW_PNf5LObl6Zb)

item.title: Dark Streets & Darker Secrets: Beneath the Canals
item.dc:creator: @RichardRuane
item.description:
@RichardRuane wrote:

Hey everyone, we’ve had a spot open up, so if you’ve been wanting to try out a hangouts series (starting tonight!), jump in with the links above (just be sure to sign up for each session you want to attend).

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Streets & Darker Secrets: Beneath the Canals
item.dc:creator: @JasonT
item.description:
@JasonT wrote:

AHHHH I can’t believe someone is running TWO games in one that I want to play, in a time slot I can make, AND I was able to RSVP on time to secure a spot in each! Very excited.

Read full topic
